function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Discussion of disease hotspots and prevention indicating potential for disease outbreak","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Combining and synthesizing information without rigorous validation may result in the propagation of inaccuracies","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Thematic analysis approach may introduce subjective bias and interpretation variability","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of relevant literature on smart solutions and technologies for pandemic and cities","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential bias in the selected literature","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Rapidly expanding research leading to oversight of relevant literature","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of universal definition for smartness leading to ambiguity in implementation and evaluation","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Focus on technological dimensions of smart cities leading to neglect of non-physical components","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of diverse smart technologies for covid-19 pandemic response without clear evaluation criteria","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of adaptation strategies to enhance long-term performance","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Low perception of social support leading to increased likelihood of developing psychological distress and psychiatric conditions.","category":"Social Expression","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases due to inadequate supplies during quarantine period leading to anxiety and frustration","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases due to inadequate information from public health authorities","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Loneliness and boredom from social isolation and uncertainty related to restrictions and lockdown measures","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Distress, frustration, and loneliness due to confinement and loss of social/physical contact","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious spread of psychological effects such as depression, stress, anger, anxiety, and insomnia due to quarantine and between air travel volume and imported dengue cases","category":"Transport","confidence":"High"},{"name":"International travel and transmission of denv","category":"Transport","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dissemination of results to various stakeholders","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Continuous assembly of data from various sources","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Significant time lags in traditional surveillance methods for health development","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid-19 impacting the construction industry","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of diagnosis related groups charges
